ValidationRule.description: Case must have the "Approved" field checked before it can be closed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName='Quote_Request', PRIORVALUE(Status)!="Closed", ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed"), TEXT(Approval_Needed__c)='Yes', Approved__c=FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Case must be approved before closing
